tool_description: The eBay Data Hub API provides endpoints to access essential functionalities such as retrieving items, orders, and user information, leaving feedback, and managing messages.
name: eBay Data Hub
title: eBay Data Hub

api_list.name: Get buyers/bidders
Get user
Get my messages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/EbayGetMyMessages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com/EbayGetMyMessages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-data-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
